data.title: Husserl and Stumpf
data.meta_description: Carl Stumpf was Brentano’s “oldest pupil”,1 for he began attending lectures of his mentor before any of the other Brentanists. He was already studying law in Würzburg (not because a career in this area interested him, but rather because it...
